directions: Stir coffee with rum and liqueur. Pour into two dessert coffee mugs. Top with a generous amount of coconut whipped cream. Sprinkle with ground cinnamon and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 cups freshly brewed dark roast coffee
2 ounces Frangelico or another hazelnut liqueur
Gay Lea Real Coconut Whipped Cream
title: Nutty Coconut Coffee
